titleStmt.title: The second part of The confutation of the Ballancing letter containing an occasional discourse in vindication of Magna Charta.
Confutation of the balancing letter. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Samuel, 1649-1703.
Johnson, Samuel, 1649-1703. Confutation of a late pamphlet intituled A letter ballancing the necessity of keeping a landforce in time of peace.

notesStmt.note: Signature A2 is cropped in filmed copy. Pages beginning-15 photographed from Cambridge University Library copy and inserted at end.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
